title: Rivian's R2, R3 and R3X launch event in 5 minutes
description: For years, Rivian has been promising to make a smaller, more affordable electric SUV that will sit alongside its pricier R1T and R1S vehicles, and that day is finally here. The R2 wont go into production until 2026, but when it does it will come with an estimated range of 330 miles, a 060mph time of three seconds, and a starting price of $45,000. We also got a look at the R3 the R2s sibling, and the R3X, the R3s performance trim which has a wider stance and smaller crossover shape.
